name: FinancialBarometer.com
tag_list: finance, trends, business, news, investor, trader
overview:
FinancialBarometer.com provides, for free, business news trends to stock market investors as multiple studies have shown correlations between ‘market sentiments’ created by upbeat or downbeat news articles and market movements.

News trends are provided at daily, weekly and monthly levels as they reflect different behavioral time-series (e.g. week-end investors vs. daily trader).

Investors can now, in addition to more conventional information, rely on business news trends to make better investment decisions.
